text:
Lisa Marie Presley (born February 1, 1968) is an American singer-songwriter. She is the only child of singer/actor Elvis Presley.
She owns Graceland, the mansion her father lived in. She has released three albums.
Early Life.
Lisa was born in Baptist Memorial Hospital-Memphis in Memphis, Tennessee, She was growing up with Presley Family lived in Graceland with her parents until Elvis' death in 1977.
Personal Life.
Presley was married to Danny Keough, Michael Jackson, Nicolas Cage and her present husband Michael Lockwood. She has four children. Two of the children are with Keough. The other two are with Lockwood.
